description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the professional services of two journalists for role playing services.",
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
================================

**Journalists - Role Playing Professional Services**

**Solicitation Number:** W6369-24-X010

**Publication Date:** 2023-09-05

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-16T14:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** National Defence Headquarters

**Description of Requirements:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the professional services of two journalists to provide role playing services. The contract period is an initial three (3) years with the option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods, subject to the same conditions.

**Security Requirements:**

This requirement involves security provisions. Additional information is provided in Part 6 – Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 – Resulting Contract Clauses. For more information on personnel and organization security screening, as well as security clauses, bidders should visit the Contract Security Program website of Public Services and Procurement Canada.

**Tender Notice:**

This tender notice is an open bidding process, and the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers. The requirement is for professional services only, and documents may be submitted in either English or French.

**UNSPSC Codes:**

* 80171800 - Media relations services
* 80171801 - Media monitoring service
* 80171802 - Media relations and advisory service
* 80171803 - Media training and coaching service

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender invitation is subject to the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Region of Delivery:**

This contract will be executed within the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contact Information:**

Djamel Djouaher, Contracting Authority
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2
Phone: (613) 408-8346
Email: [Djamel.Djouaher@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Djamel.Dj
